data.title: Official Website - Max Brown Hotels
data.meta_description: Max Brown is a collection of locally inspired boutique hotels with five unique locations in Amsterdam, Berlin, Düsseldorf and Vienna.

WELCOME TO MAX BROWN HOTELS

You’ll find us near cosy corners. Close to local favourites. But never far from the must-sees. Max Brown welcomes you to five of the coolest neighbourhoods in Europe – where you can live, eat and sleep like a local. Explore the places we love and the people who call them home.

MEET THE NEW MAX BROWN 5TH DISTRICT IN VIENNA

WHERE DO YOU WANT TO GO?

AMSTERDAM

Max Brown has two hotels in the centre of Amsterdam: Max Brown Museum Square and Max Brown Canal District.

VISIT AMSTERDAM

BERLIN

Whether you’re visiting Berlin to explore its past or embrace its future, Max Brown Ku’damm is the place to be.

VISIT BERLIN

DÜSSELDORF

Vibrant, edgy, impulsive, creative, evolving, pioneering. Whatever you want to call it, make sure you call Düsseldorf ‘home’ at Max Brown Midtown.

VISIT DÜSSELDORF

VIENNA

Welcome to Vienna, the heart of Europe. In a city full of leafy parks, grand palaces, and endless natural beauty, enjoy the charm of two Max Brown hotels: 7th District, tucked away in an artsy pocket of the city, and soon 5th District, located just steps from the centre.

VISIT VIENNA

MILAN

Nestled in the vibrant heart of Milan, our first Max Brown property in Italy exudes a welcoming and unpretentious vibe, reflecting the neighborhood’s dynamic and artistic energy.

VISIT MILAN

SIRCLE CLUB

OUR *MOST SPECIAL* SPECIALS

Join Sircle Club to get peak special treatment at Max Brown and our sister hotels. You’ll be the first to know about exclusive offers and get the best deals – like a members-only rate at all Sircle Collection hotels, forever. You’ll also be able to personalise your stays by letting us know what you like, and change your bookings with maximum flexibility.

JOIN THE CLUB

SIRCLE CLUB

OUR *MOST SPECIAL* SPECIALS

Join Sircle Club to get peak special treatment at Max Brown and our sister hotels. You’ll be the first to know about exclusive offers and get the best deals – like a members-only rate at all Sircle Collection hotels, forever. You’ll also be able to personalise your stays by letting us know what you like, and change your bookings with maximum flexibility.

JOIN THE CLUB

SUSTAINABILITY

Caring for the Planet

Each Max Brown hotel has been recognized by EcoStars for our commitment to sustainability. This means we’ve shown our dedication to caring for the planet and met the high standards set by EcoStars, a global leader in hotel sustainability certification.

READ MORE

SUSTAINABILITY

Caring for the Planet

Every Max Brown has received sustainability’s gold star with EarthCheck recognition, showing our commitment to the planet and its care. EarthCheck is the world’s top certification, consulting and advisory group for sustainable destinations and tourism organisations.

READ MORE

BE THE FIRST TO KNOW

Sign up for our newsletter to stay informed about the latest news, events and best rates.

Erfahre es als erster

Melde Dich für unseren Newsletter an, um stets über die neuesten Nachrichten, Veranstaltungen, sowie die besten Preise informiert zu sein.
